headline: Union Pacific, Norfolk Southern file for merger approval
summary: Union Pacific Corp. and Norfolk Southern Corp. filed their application with the Surface Transportation Board on Friday for Union Pacific to acquire Norfolk Southern, according to the two companies. Now the STB has 30 days to determine whether it can accept the application. If it does, a long comment period begins to determine if the acquisition meets conditions the STB set 25 years ago in ...
